snippet: Gains in private hiring, fewer layoffs and fewer applications for unemployment insurance in December were reported in three surveys on Thursday.
abstract: United States job market shows resilience in three reports released, suggesting it may withstand continuing federal budget battle that threatens more economic uncertainty in coming months.
lead_paragraph: Gains in private hiring, fewer layoffs and fewer applications for unemployment insurance in December were reported in three surveys on Thursday.

headline.main: Job Market Strengthened as the Year Wound Down
headline.print_headline: Job Market Strengthened as the Year Wound Down
